speaker: Marge Simpson
quote: Take it, Homer!
raw_quote: Take it, Homer!

speaker: Homer Simpson
quote: RUDOLPH WITH YOUR NOSE... OVER HERE... / SO YOU CAN GUIDE MY SLEIGH TODAY....
raw_quote: (SINGING) RUDOLPH WITH YOUR NOSE... OVER HERE... / SO YOU CAN GUIDE MY SLEIGH TODAY....

speaker: Marge Simpson
quote: Oh, Homer.
raw_quote: Oh, Homer.

speaker: Lisa Simpson
quote: THEN ALL THE REINDEER LOVED HIM / AS THEY SHOUTED OUT WITH GLEE / RUDOLPH THE RED NOSED REINDEER / YOU'LL GO DOWN IN HISTORY...
raw_quote: (SINGING) THEN ALL THE REINDEER LOVED HIM / AS THEY SHOUTED OUT WITH GLEE / RUDOLPH THE RED NOSED REINDEER / YOU'LL GO DOWN IN HISTORY...

speaker: Bart Simpson
quote: Like Attila the Hun!
raw_quote: Like Attila the Hun!
